_header: Early on morrow and toward night also
_description: ‘A tretys of Crystys Passyoun’ (verses on a picture of the Crucifixion) — seven 8-line stanzas including ‘Verba compilatoris’ (last stanza)

BodLauMis683.First Lines:
Erly on morwe and toward nyght alsoffirst and last looke on this
                    ffygure…
BodLauMis683.Last Lines:
…In remembraunce of crystys passiounKnelyng be fore this
                    dolorous pite
BodLauMis683.Attributed Title: Here is a tretys of Crystys passioun (f. 15v)
BodLauMis683.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
EETS
         e.s. 107 (1911; repr. 1961): 250-2.
